actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Centers Act to reorganize certain grant programs, and for other purposes.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Permits the inclusion of treatment centers and programs set up by States in the grants authorized by the Community Mental Health Centers Act for the treatment of drug abuse and drug problems. Sets forth requirements for a State before approval of such grants by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Centers Act to reorganize certain grant programs, and for other purposes.
